text: U sumoro az jak tan ofarid, on goh hamsarasro niz az vaj padid ovard va ʙaroi [istifodai] sumo hast nav' az cahorpojon [naru modai sutur, gov, gusfand va ʙuz]-ro ofarid. Sumoro dar sikami modaraton taji marohili muxtalif dar nihongohhoi segona meofarinad. In ast Alloh taolo, Parvardigori sumo, ki farmonravoi xosi Ust. Ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest, pas, ci guna ʙa ʙeroha meraved
